scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:full: NODE_ENV=test npm run db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test npm run db:seed && NODE_ENV=test node --test tests/
scripts.test:clean: NODE_ENV=test npm run db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test npm run db:seed && NODE_ENV=test node --test tests/ && NODE_ENV=test npm run db:drop
scripts.pg: docker exec -it blogapp-postgres-1 psql -U test -d blogApp
scripts.pg:test: docker exec -it blogapp-postgres_test-1 psql -U test -d blogApp_test
